meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Melanie Yulman Mike McCormick Jennifer North Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6493.

td.p: Melanie Yulman, a lower schoolteacher from Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
Mike McCormick, a logistics director from Hockessin, Delaware
Jennifer North, an attorney from Jersey City, New Jersey (whose 1-day cash winnings total $9,200)

tr.td: (Alex: You have to name the female singer for us.)
